projectGridLines.title: Software Engineering - Backend Eng, Big Data Processing, Cloud Platform
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

- You will be working on Sundial’s Big Data Platform and Distributed System for Insights, DataScience and ML.

- The work would be on a data platform powered by Big Data Processing tools like Spark, Postgres, OpenSearch orchestrated through Kubernetes, Dagster and AWS services.

- The platform is an AWS based multi-tenant SaaS Big Data Platform product built for Data Science, ML and Analytics.

- The project work would revolve around any or all of the 3 areas - 1. Sundial Big Data Platform 2. Sundial’s insights-engine and Backend Insights Processing Layer, 3. Sundial’s AWS based Cloud Platform.

- You would get to work with a Strong Top Talent Engineering team in an early stage startup environment with exposure to end to end System and Product Building.

 

Skill sets:  Knowledge in the below areas is a plus: Languages like Go, Python, JS. Cloud platform services in AWS, Big-Data Platforms like Spark, Bigquery etc., Backend Engineering, Data Science, ML, Analytics

 

Expected learning: Knowledge in the below areas is a plus: Big Data Processing, Backend Engineering, Go, Python, AWS Cloud Infrastructure, Distributed Systems
